item.title: Syria Live Updates: Rebels Declare Damascus Free of al-Assad
item.description: After just a few days of rapid advances, the rebels appeared to control Syria’s capital. They said they would work with a top official in President Ba...

item.title: Syrians Mourn All They Have Lost, Even as They Celebrate
item.description: Thoughts of loved ones dead or missing complicate joyous relief at the prospect of an end to the rule of Bashar al-Assad.

item.title: Syria Civil War: What to Know About the Conflict and the Rebel Groups
item.description: Advances by a coalition of opposition groups have abruptly transformed the landscape of Syria’s civil war. Here’s a closer look at where things stand.

item.title: She Sued Over Transgender ‘Conversion Therapy,’ a First for China
item.description: Ling’er won a settlement payout from the hospital where she was held for three months against her will and subjected to electroshock therapy.

item.title: France Unveils a Renovated Notre-Dame, 5 Years After a Ruinous Fire
